채용 상세
                    Datacrunch (https://www.datacrunchglobal.com) is the leader in Analytics Based Management Consulting. If you are looking for a company working with talented peers to solve the industry's most tech…
            더 보기
            Datacrunch (https://www.datacrunchglobal.com) is the leader in Analytics Based Management Consulting. If you are looking for a company working with talented peers to solve the industry's most technology savvy projects, Datacrunch is the right place for you.We only recruit the cream of the field.1. Level:Junior Data AnalystSenior Data AnalystJunior Data ScientistSenior Data ScientistLead Data Scientist2. Lab: Data Science & AI Lab 3. R&R:- Probabilistic and machine learning model based - strategy and operation consulting- Digital Transformation Strategy Consulting3. Requirements:- Strong understanding of mathematic operations of probability statistics and machine learning.- Fluency in either of SQL, R, Python, Spark, and Hadoop.- Strong insights on overall corporate operational processes.- Strong strategic consulting capabilities.- Outstanding MS or PhD in either of Management Science, Marketing, Cognitive related studies, Industrial Engineering, Econometrics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Decision Science, Electrical Engineering, or Mechanical Engineering.- Fluent in speaking and written English communication.- Very comfortable with global working environments.- Creative in challenging problem solving.- Spirit in tough project schedules.- Collegiality with the team.- Professional protocols and good social skills with client engagements.- High work ethics abiding by the code.4. Workplace: Datacrunch HQ or client site/ Mostly Seoul, sometimes overseas.5. Compensation: Top of our profession.6. Employment Type: Full-time or contract based.7. Resume review: At position vacancy.8. Contact & apply: hr@datacrunchglobal.com
